title: How Worried Should You Be About Dying in Your Sleep?
sub_head: Doctors say sudden nocturnal death is relatively rare. Here is what to know about the risk factors.
body:
There are a lot of things to worry about these days. Should dying during sleep be one of them?
Comedian Bob Sagetâ€™s death earlier this month at age 65 prompted conversations about the possibility and risks after he was found unresponsive in a hotel room bed, though no cause of death has been announced. Doctors say dying during sleep is a perennial source of anxiety for patients, particularly those with cardiac issues.
